modName: Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn Rug Fix
summary: Just a small mod that fixes the texture Z-Fighting bug, when using a combination of mods.
descriptionHtml:
Hi there,

This is just a small 1Kb in size mod and all it does is translate the z position of the rug at the entrance of the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood slightly.

I was using a conjunction of mods, one of which is the sands of time sleeping encounters mod, and i believe at some point one of the mods has brought the rug down to the collidable floor below. Which in the creation kit you can do by pressing F, causing Z-Fighting with the floor texture and the model texture.

Just load this esp last and it will fix the position of the rug, and it is a totally safe as the tiny translation is the only thing contained in this esp file.
author: Artorius
